alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 10:14PM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Jackson, Greene and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning to a crest of 22.5 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.5 feet on 01/01/2016. &&
